00014 #ifndef HOSTSTATE_H
00015 #define HOSTSTATE_H
00016 
00017 #include "ImNotifiable.h"
00018 
00034 class HostState : public BBItem
00035 {
00036     BBITEM_METAINFO(BBItem)
00037 
00038 public:
00039     enum States
00040         {
00041           ACTIVE, 
00042           FAILED, 
00044           BROKEN, 
00046           SLEEP,  
00047           OFF     
00048         };
00049     // we could make a nice 'info' field here, to allow us to specify
00050     // the cause of failure (e.g. battery, stochastic hardware failure)
00051 
00052 private:
00053     States state;
00054 
00055 public:
00056   HostState(States state = ACTIVE):
00057     state(state)
00058   {}
00059 
00061     States get() const { return state; }
00063     void set(States s) { state = s; }
00064 
00065     std::string info() const {
00066     std::ostringstream ost;
00067     switch(state) {
00068     case ACTIVE:
00069       ost << "ACTIVE";
00070       break;
00071     case FAILED:
00072       ost << "FAILED";
00073       break;
00074     case BROKEN:
00075       ost << "BROKEN";
00076       break;
00077     case SLEEP:
00078       ost << "SLEEP";
00079       break;
00080     case OFF:
00081       ost << "OFF";
00082       break;
00083     default:
00084       ost << "Unknown";
00085       break;
00086     }
00087     return ost.str();
00088   }
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif
